mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( member_id, order_uid, product_name, order_price, paid_amount, status, pg_provider, payment_method, transaction_id, buyer_name, buyer_email, buyer_phone, created_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{orderUid}, #{productName}, #{orderPrice}, #{paidAmount}, #{status}, #{pgProvider}, #{paymentMethod}, #{transactionId}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerPhone}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM payment WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM payment WHERE order_uid = #{orderUid})

SELECT id, member_id AS memberId, order_uid AS orderUid, product_name AS productName, order_price AS orderPrice, paid_amount AS paidAmount, payment_method AS paymentMethod, status, transaction_id AS transactionId, created_at AS createdAt, pg_provider AS pgProvider, buyer_name AS buyerName, buyer_email AS buyerEmail, buyer_phone AS buyerPhone, order_id AS orderId FROM payment WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId} LIMIT 1
